title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, gather requirements from stakeholders, and create a detailed project plan.

title: System Architecture Design for LifeGoalWorkAligner
description: Design the overall system architecture including components, data flow, integration points, and considerations for scalability, maintainability, security, accessibility, and performance. Also, outline strategies for handling sensitive user data with regards to privacy and consent, and provide a detailed analysis of potential challenges and proposed solutions. Additionally, suggest an initial high-level design that can serve as a starting point for the implementation phase.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema and data models to support the application's requirements, including user profiles, goals, tasks, progress tracking, performance metrics, and normalize tables for data consistency. Address data integrity, security, scalability, and maintainability in design. Consider edge cases, error handling, and performance optimizations. Review and align with the System Architecture Design and User Requirements Gathering before implementation. Ensure data models are flexible enough to accommodate future updates or expansions of the platform, and ensure that they follow best practices for database design, such as using normalization and ensuring proper indexing for efficient queries. Once completed, review and provide feedback on the design with a focus on optimizing for performance and maintainability.

title: User Interface Design (UI/UX) - Enhanced
description: Update the User Interface and User Experience design for the LifeGoalWorkAligner platform. The enhanced design should incorporate best practices for accessibility, responsiveness, usability across various devices and screen sizes. Optimize for performance and error handling, considering edge cases and scalability. Collaborate with User Research and Persona Development team to ensure user needs are met. Prioritize cross-browser compatibility, adhere to web standards, and consider internationalization aspects for a global audience. Consider feedback from the previous RFC 'System Architecture Design' while designing. Additionally, to maintain consistency with the branding and visual identity, collaborate closely with Graphic Design team. To ensure the design is scalable and can handle potential future features, liaise with the Code-Architect on the system architecture aspects.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend services, APIs, and business logic for the platform.

title: Frontend Development
description: Implement the user interface and integrate with the backend services.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the platform adheres to security best practices and compliance requirements.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for functional, integration, and performance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the platform.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for the platform.
